name: meatiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being full of meat or tasting strongly like meat: A delicious smoked salmon consommé somehow combined smokiness and meatiness. A sprinkle of salt brings out the meatiness of the steak. See
meaty
More examplesFewer examplesMy pigeon came with a nugget of foie gras to emphasise the meatiness of the dish.The dish has a delicious meatiness and savory flavor.We used beef to get the meatiness I was going for.
